attributes.action: Remove politicians from office for benefitting from tax loopholes
attributes.background: In the interest of the UK economy, no-one who holds a public office role should benefit from offshore tax havens or utilize their wealth and posistion to legally or otherwise exploit tax loopholes. Anyone entering Public Office should legally and morally declare their private finances and taxes paid

rejection.details:
We're not sure which groups you would like to be covered by the terms "public office" and "politicians". If you would like this to apply to MPs, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127185

Otherwise, you could start a new petition explaining clearly who you would like to be covered.
